softwareGame

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • softwareGame.Stock

  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean INVARIANT
      The class invariant checks that the MAXDOM value is bigger than the MINDOM value, MAXSIZE value is bigger than the MINSIZE and that the MAXSIZE and DominoInt.TOTAL are consistent.
      static int MAXDOM
      Maximum value of a side of a domino to add on the stock.
      static int MAXSIZE
      Maximum value of the size of the stock.

      Minimum value of a side of a domino to add on the stock.

      Minimum value of the size of the stock.

    • Field Detail

      • MINDOM

        public static final int MINDOM
        Minimum value of a side of a domino to add on the stock. Must be consistent with the minimum value of a side on the class DominoInt.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAXDOM

        public static final int MAXDOM
        Maximum value of a side of a domino to add on the stock. Must be consistent with the maximum value of a side on the class DominoInt.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MINSIZE

        public static final int MINSIZE
        Minimum value of the size of the stock. When it is empty.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAXSIZE

        public static final int MAXSIZE
        Maximum value of the size of the stock. Value reach when none of the domino pieces has been drawn to the players. Must be consistent to the total amount of domino pieces DominoInt.TOTAL .
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INVARIANT

        public static final boolean INVARIANT
        The class invariant checks that the MAXDOM value is bigger than the MINDOM value, MAXSIZE value is bigger than the MINSIZE and that the MAXSIZE and DominoInt.TOTAL are consistent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Stock getInstance()
        Returns:
        the unique instance of Table.

      • getPieces

        public java.util.ArrayList<DominoInt> getPieces()
        Returns:
        the list of domino pieces on the stock.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representation of the stock. It consists on the list of dominoes separated by ",".

      • draw

        public DominoInt draw()
               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                      InvariantBrokenException
        Get a domino from the stock. The piece is selected randomly and the removed from the stock.
        Returns:
        the piece drawn from the stock.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Stock is empty.
        InvariantBrokenException - if the Stock state is not valid after execution.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        the integer size of the stock.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check if the stock is empty. A stock is empty if its size is 0.
        Returns:
        true if the stock is empty, false otherwise.

      • invariant

        public boolean invariant()
        Check if the size of the stock is between the limits. Check if all the pieces on the Stock are valid.
        Returns:
        True if the stock is in a valid state. False otherwise.
